description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The goal is hack the system, changing numbers positions and doing triple!  Decrease the target number before timer fall to zero. Let's see how far you can go!
description.short: The goal is hack the system, changing numbers positions and doing triple!  Decrease the target number before timer fall to zero. Let's see how far you can go!
